channel.title: Error: Cannot Find Specified Feed
channel.description: Some information about the RSS FooReader - a DHTML page that reads or parses RSS files and dynamically displays them...

item.title: Uh Oh...
item.description: An error occurred when trying to retrieve the feed you wanted to display. The feed most likely does not exist. This may be remedied by either refreshing the page or clicking the Refresh Feeds link.
